name: Bwudaling: Da Fight for da Bwudahood
name_original: Bwudaling: Da Fight for da Bwudahood
description:
The game nobody wanted but everyone needed. The evil Twent has attacked, bringing his minions with him, as well as hundreds of saws to block your path. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge to prove your love for Bwuda, the almighty, as you track Twent down to his evil lair, and finish him once and for all.

Bwudaling is the next great bullet hell, where you'll use the unique abilities of one of 4 classes to bring yourself and your friends past the waves of saws sent to stop you, tracking down the bosses found at the ends of all 3 map packs. With the truly immaculate character customization you'll find, featuring almost 20 entire (mostly distinct) unlockable AND WEARABLE t-shirts, you won't want to miss out on the future 2053 GOTY
